manifest.name: react-scroll-sync
manifest.description: Syncronize scroll positions across multiple scrollable containers

scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

manifest.readme:
# react-scroll-sync
Synced scroll position across multiple scrollable elements

## Demo

http://react-sync-scroll.netlify.com/

## Documentation & Example

http://react-sync-scroll.netlify.com/

## License

MIT
